text: Ara tadera madhye ke'u-ke'u tomara dike kana pate, ara tadera antahkaranera upare amara diye rekhechi dhakana pache tara ta upalabdhi karate pare, ara tadera kane gurubhara. Ara yadi'o tara pratyekati nidarsana pratyaksa kare tabu tara tomara sange tarkabitarka kare, yara abisbasa posana kare tara bale -- ''e to agera dinera upakatha byatita ara kichu'i naya.â€™â€™
